response.original_title: Trailer Trauma at the Drive-In Part 2
response.overview: 120 hours of incredible martial arts, action, adventure, exploitation, blaxploitation, and horror feature films edited down to the craziest, most mind-blowing 180 minutes you will clap your eyes on at the drive-in. Screened exclusively at the Mahoning Drive-In Theater on 35mm and containing trailers never before seen on any previous Trailer Trauma installments!
response.tagline: A MIND BLOWING 3 HOURS OF NEVER-BEFORE-SCREENED GENRE MOVIE TRAILERS FROM THE EXHUMED FILMS / GARAGEHOUSE PICTURES ARCHIVE!
response.title: Trailer Trauma at the Drive-In Part 2
